attributes.action: resign once this petition gets 1000 signitures or more.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition believe that Tony Blair has been in office for too long and should resign from his position once this petition gets 1000 signitures or more.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
